message.original: ハイデル平原は、一番落ち着きます 白竜さまのお膝元ですし――
message.translation: The Hidell Plains is mostly calm. It is closest to the White Dragon.

message.original: ハイデルにこれ以上オークが 侵入してきたら、大変です――
message.translation: There are very few Orcs that inhabit the Hidell Plains. However, If they infiltrate the city, there will be tragedy.

message.original: ハーブは薬の材料になります 見つけたら多めに採っておいた方が――
message.translation: Herbs are a crafting material. That can be later crafted into medicine.

message.original: なるべく街道沿いを歩きましょう 少しでも安全なところを
message.translation: If we walk along the road, it will be much safer. Beyond it, danger lurks.

message.original: テルに寄ったら、またアルフレドさんに ご挨拶しておかないと――
message.translation: If we visit the Village of Tel, we should greet Alfred at the Black Grape Tavern.
